pageContext.claim: “And by the way, you have car plants moving into Michigan, moving into Ohio, moving into Pennsylvania -- massive, massive companies -- moving into South Carolina, moving into North Carolina. They're all coming back and that means jobs.”
pageContext.analysis: Some investments have been announced in Michigan. There's no evidence of auto plants moving to Ohio, Pennsylvania, North Carolina or South Carolina. Trump has said these are the states where he hopes automakers will build more cars; it just hasn't happened. Some plants may close because of Trump's tariffs.
